mapper.select: select user_id, password, nickname, email, profile_pic, language from wine.member where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into wine.member (user_id, password, nickname, email) values (#{userId}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{email})
mapper.select: select (select IFNULL(sum(count), 0) from wine.wine_log where type = "IN" and user_id = m.user_id) number_of_buying , (select IFNULL(sum(count), 0) from wine.wine_log where type = "OUT" and user_id = m.user_id) number_of_drinking , (select IFNULL(sum(price * count), 0) from wine.wine_log where type = "IN" and user_id = m.user_id) money_spent from wine.member m where m.user_id = #{userId};

select w.wine_id, l.log_id, l.date, l.type, w.name wine_name, w.vintage, w.size wine_size, l.count, l.price, l.place, r.rating rate, w.thumb, w.thumb_bottom
, (select sum(price * count) from wine.wine_log where date = l.date and type = "IN" and user_id = w.user_id) spend_today
, (select sum(count) from wine.wine_log where date = l.date and type = "OUT" and user_id = w.user_id) drink_today
from wine.wine w inner join wine.wine_log l on l.wine_id = w.wine_id left join wine.review r on r.log_id = l.log_id where w.user_id = #{userId} and l.type = 'IN' and l.type = 'OUT' order by l.date desc, l.type, w.name desc, l.log_id desc limit ${(page - 1) * pageSize}, ${pageSize + 1}

select D.DATE month, IFNULL(L.money, 0) money from ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DD.Date, '%Y-%m') AS DATE FROM wine.dummy_date DD
DATE_FORMAT(DD.DATE, '%Y-%m') between DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(now(), INTERVAL -1 YEAR), '%Y-%m') AND DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(DD.DATE, '%Y-%m') between CONCAT(#{year}, '-01') and CONCAT(#{year}, '-12')
DD.date >= (select min(date) from wine.wine_log where user_id = #{userId} and type = 'IN') and DD.date <= now()
DATE_FORMAT(DD.DATE, '%Y-%m') between DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(now(), INTERVAL -${year * -1} YEAR), '%Y-%m') AND DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m')
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(DD.Date, '%Y-%m') ) D left join ( select DATE_FORMAT(Date, '%Y-%m') month, sum(price * count) money from wine.wine_log where user_id = #{userId} and type = 'IN' group by month) L on L.month = D.date order by month asc

select C.date, C.count, C.count_in, C.count_out, C.stock from ( select B.date, B.count, B.count_in, B.count_out, sum(B.count) over(order by B.date) stock from ( select A.date, sum(A.count_in + IFNULL(LO.count, 0) * (-1)) count, A.count_in, sum(IFNULL(LO.count, 0)) count_out from ( select D.date, sum(IFNULL(LI.count, 0)) count_in from wine.dummy_date D left join (select DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') date, sum(count) count, type from wine.wine_log where user_id = #{userId} and type = 'IN' group by date) LI on D.date = LI.date group by D.date ) A left join (select DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') date, sum(count) count, type from wine.wine_log where user_id = #{userId} and type = 'OUT' group by date) LO on A.date = LO.date group by A.date ) B )C where
C.date >= DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(now(), INTERVAL -1 YEAR), '%Y-%m-%d') and C.date <= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
C.date >= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{year}, '-01-01'), '%Y-%m-%d') and C.date <= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{year}, '-12-31'), '%Y-%m-%d') and C.date <= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
C.date >= (select DATE_FORMAT(min(date), '%Y-%m-%d') from wine.wine_log where user_id = #{userId}) and C.date <= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
C.date >= DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(now(), INTERVAL -${year * -1} YEAR), '%Y-%m-%d') and C.date <= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')

choose.when: select wine_type type, sum(count) count from wine.wine where user_id = #{userId} group by wine_type order by count desc
choose.otherwise: select W.wine_type type, sum(WL.count) count from wine.wine W left join wine.wine_log WL on W.wine_id = WL.wine_id and WL.type = 'IN' 'OUT' where W.user_id = #{userId} group by W.wine_type order by count desc

mapper.select:
select A.country, A.count from( select
W.country country,
W.region country,
IFNULL(sum(W.count), 0) count
IFNULL(sum(WL.count), 0) count
from wine.wine W
left join wine.wine_log WL on WL.wine_id = W.wine_id
and WL.type = 'IN'
and WL.type = 'OUT'
where W.user_id = #{userId} group by
W.country
W.region
order by count desc limit 10 ) A
union all
select 'others' as country, IFNULL(sum(B.count), 0) count from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER() row_num, A.country, A.count from( select
W.country country,
W.region country,
IFNULL(sum(W.count), 0) count
IFNULL(sum(WL.count), 0) count
from wine.wine W
left join wine.wine_log WL on WL.wine_id = W.wine_id
and WL.type = 'IN'
and WL.type = 'OUT'
where W.user_id = #{userId} group by
W.country
W.region
order by count desc ) A ) B where B.row_num > 10

select IFNULL(SUM(case when (WL.price / ER.USD) >= 0 and (WL.price / ER.USD) < 10 then WL.count end), 0) 'range0To10' , IFNULL(SUM(case when (WL.price / ER.USD) >= 10 and (WL.price / ER.USD) < 50 then WL.count end), 0) 'range10To50' , IFNULL(SUM(case when (WL.price / ER.USD) >= 50 and (WL.price / ER.USD) < 100 then WL.count end), 0) 'range50To100' , IFNULL(SUM(case when (WL.price / ER.USD) >= 100 and (WL.price / ER.USD) < 500 then WL.count end), 0) 'range100To500' , IFNULL(SUM(case when (WL.price / ER.USD) >= 500 and (WL.price / ER.USD) < 1000 then WL.count end), 0) 'range500To1000' , IFNULL(SUM(case when (WL.price / ER.USD) >= 1000 then WL.count end), 0) 'rangeFrom1000' from wine.wine_log WL left join wine.exchange_rate ER on 1=1 where WL.user_id = #{userId} and WL.type = 'IN'

select CONCAT(W.name, IFNULL(CONCAT(' - ', W.vintage), ''), (CASE WHEN W.size != 'Standard' THEN CONCAT(' [', W.size, ']') ELSE '' END)) name, MAX(R.rating) value from wine.wine W inner join wine.wine_log WL on WL.wine_id = W.wine_id inner join wine.review R on R.log_id = WL.log_id where W.user_id = #{userId} group by W.name, W.vintage, W.size order by value desc limit 3

select T2.name name, (T2.user_average_rating / (T2.user_average_price / ER.USD)) value from ( select T1.wine_id, T1.name, T1.user_average_rating, (sum(LI.price * LI.count) / SUM(LI.count)) user_average_price from ( select W.wine_id, W.name, AVG(R.rating) user_average_rating from wine.wine W left join wine.wine_log LO on LO.wine_id = W.wine_id and LO.type = 'OUT' left join wine.review R on R.log_id = LO.log_id inner join (select AVG(rating) total_average_rating from wine.review where user_id = #{userId}) R2 on R.rating > R2.total_average_rating where W.user_id = #{userId} group by W.wine_id, W.name ) T1 left join wine.wine_log LI on LI.wine_id = T1.wine_id and LI.type = 'IN' and LI.price > 0 group by T1.wine_id, T1.name ) T2 left join wine.exchange_rate ER on 1=1 order by value desc, T2.user_average_price desc limit 3

select W.name name, SUM(WL.count) value from wine.wine W inner join wine.wine_log WL on WL.wine_id = W.wine_id and WL.type = 'OUT' where W.user_id = #{userId} group by W.name order by value desc limit 3

select CONCAT(W.name, IFNULL(CONCAT(' - ', W.vintage), ''), (CASE WHEN W.size != 'Standard' THEN CONCAT(' [', W.size, ']') ELSE '' END)) name , (MAX(WL.price) / ER.USD) value from wine.wine W inner join wine.wine_log WL on WL.wine_id = W.wine_id and WL.type = 'IN' left join wine.exchange_rate ER on 1=1 where W.user_id = #{userId} group by W.name, W.vintage, W.size, ER.USD order by value desc limit 3
